6.heading: Heaven.
6.title: "Entertaining the Angels"
6.author: by Ray Billingsley.
notes: Summary: Curtis plans to entertain with rap tunes in heaven, like Sammy Davis Jr. is probably dancing right now, but little brother doubts Curtis is going to heaven.

8.heading: Heaven.
8.title: "Fyodor Dostoyevsky's The Onion"
8.author: Alec Stevens
8.appears_in: p. 78-80 in Heavy Metal, v. 14, no. 6 (Jan. 1991).
notes: Summary: A wicked peasant woman dies and goes to the lake of fire. Her guardian angel argues that she once gave an onion to a beggar. God says if the angel can pull her out of the lake with an onion she can go to heaven.

9.heading: Heaven.
9.title: "I Could Go To Heaven"
9.author: by Bill Watterson.
notes: Summary: Calvin is talking about all the places he could go on his bicycle, when it attacks him.

notes: Topics: Heaven, angels, conduct of life.

notes: Summary: St. Peter is making people sink a putt in order to get into Heaven.
